sf258:5: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān upaseno rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne sarpaśauṇḍikaprāgbhāre kaliṁkopavicārāntarikāyām |
sf258:6: athāyuṣmata upasenasya ekākino rahasigatasya pratisaṁlīnasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita uggratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā |
sf258:7: tatrāyuṣmān upaseno bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayati | āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ tadyathā āṁjanaśalākā | aṁga tāvan me āyuṣmantaḥ kāyaṁ samaṁtato ’nuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharata mā ihaiva viśariṣyati tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
sf258:8: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya nātidūre niṣaṇṇo ’bhūd anyataram vṛkṣamūlaṁ niśritya |
sf258:9: aśrauṣīd āyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya vāgvyāhāram | śrutvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān upasenas tenopajagāma | upetyāyuṣmantam upasenam idam avocat |
sf258:10: na khalu vayam āyuṣmata upasenasya paśyāmo mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam | atha ca punar āyuṣmān upasena evam āha | āśīviṣo me kāye nipatitaḥ pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
sf258:11: yasyāyuṣmāñ śariputra evaṁ syāt | ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ | ahaṁ śrottaṁ ghrāṇaṁ jihvā kāyaḥ | ahaṁ manaḥ | mama manaḥ | ahaṁ rūpaṁ mama rūpam | ahaṁ śabdagandharasaspṛṣṭavyadharmā mama dharmāḥ | ahaṁ pṛthivīdhātur mama pṛthivīdhātuḥ | aham abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuḥ | ahaṁ rūpaskandho mama rūpaskandhaḥ | ahaṁ vedanāsaṁjñāsaṁskāravijñānaskandho mama vijñānaskandhaḥ | tasya syād mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam |
sf258:12: mama tu naivaṁ bhavati | ahaṁ cakṣur mama cakṣuḥ | tadyathā ahaṁ vijñānaskandho mama vijñānaskandhaḥ | tasya me kiṁ bhaviṣyati mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam |
sf258:13: dīragharāttraṁ khalv āyuṣmata upasenasya ahaṁkaramamaṁkarāsmimānābhiniveśānuśayaḥ prahīṇāḥ parijñātā ucchinnamūlās tālamastakavad anābhavagatikā āyatyām anutpādadharmāṇaḥ | tasya te kiṁ bhaviṣyati mukhasya vā anyathātvam indriyāṇāṁ vā nānākaraṇam |
sf258:14: athāyuṣmāñ śariputtraḥ āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaṁ sāmantakenānuparigṛhya bahir abhinirharati |
sf258:15: samanantarābhinirhṛta āyuṣmata upasenasya kāyaḥ śataśo viśirṇas tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
sf258:23: ādīptād vā gṛhād mukto maraṇānte na śocate ||
sf258:27: athāyuṣmāñ śāriputra āyuṣmata upasenasya śarīre śāripūjāṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁs tenopajagāma upetya bhagavatpādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṁte nyaṣīdat |
sf258:28: ekāṁtaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavaṁtam idam avocat |
sf258:29: āyuṣmato bhadaṁta upasenasya āśīviṣaḥ kāye nipatita ugratejā ghoraviṣaḥ parittas tadyathāṁ janaśalākā pūrvavad yāvat tasya kāyo viśīrṇas tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
sf258:30: sacec chāriputra upasenasya kulaputtrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāsyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaḥ kāye ’kramiṣyan nāsya kāyo viśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
sf258:31: yā bhadaṁta katamā gāthāḥ katamāni maṁtrapadāni ||
sf258:33: maitrī me dhṛtirāṣṭreṣu maitrī airāvaṇeṣu ca |
sf258:36: nandopandau ye nāgā teṣu maitrī ca me sadā ||
sf258:37: apādakeṣu me maitrī maitrī me dvipadeṣu ca |
sf258:38: catuṣpadeṣu me maitrī maitrī bahupadeṣu ca ||
sf258:39: sarvvanāgeṣu me maitrī ye nāgā udadhiniśritāḥ |
sf258:40: sarvvasatveṣu me maitrī ye ttrasāḥ sthāvarāś ca ye ||
sf258:41: sukhinaḥ sarvve satvā hi sarvve satvā niramayāḥ |
sf258:42: sarvve bhadrāṇi paśyaṁtu mā caiśāṁ pāpam āgamat ||
sf258:45: yena me satyavākyena śāstā lokeṣv anuttaraḥ |
sf258:46: tena me satyavākyena mā me kāye viṣaṁ kramet ||
sf258:47: rāgo dveṣaś ca mohaś ca ete loke viṣattrayam |
sf258:50: sarvve hataviṣa biddhās tad uraga hataṁ viṣam ||
sf258:52: tatremāni mantrapadāni bhavaṁti tadyathā | otuṁbile | tuṁbile | tuṁbe | pratuṁbe | naṭṭe | sunaṭṭe | kevaṭṭe | munaye | samaye | datte | nīlakeśe | vālakupe | ole | oṅko | svāhā ||
sf258:53: sacec chāriputtra upasenasya kulaputrasya tasmiṁ samaye imā gāthāḥ pratyabhāyaṁta imāni ca maṁtrapadāni nāsyāśīviṣaṁ kāye ’kramiṣyat | nāsya kāyo vyaśariṣyat tadyathā busamuṣṭiḥ |
sf258:54: tat kuta etad bhadaṁta labhyam āyuṣmata upasenena yat tasmiṁ samaye aśrutapūrvvā gāthāḥ pratibhāṣyaṁte aśrutapūrvvāṇi vā maṁtrapadāni tadyathā etarhi bhagavataḥ |
sf258:55: athāyuṣmāñ śāriputtro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavatpādau śirasā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāṁtaḥ ||
